headline: Why Is Seagate Technology (STX) Stock Rocketing Higher Today
summary: Shares of data storage manufacturer Seagate (NASDAQ:STX) jumped 7.2% in the afternoon session after Bank of America reaffirmed its 'Buy' rating and significantly raised its price target on the stock to $215 from $170.

raw.summary: Shares of data storage manufacturer Seagate (NASDAQ:STX) jumped 7.2% in the afternoon session after Bank of America reaffirmed its 'Buy' rating and significantly raised its price target on the stock to $215 from $170.

headline: The 3 execs now in a 'horse race' to succeed Moynihan as BofA CEO
summary: Bank of America has elevated three of CEO Brian Moynihan's lieutenants, clarifying who at the company has the best shot at running the nation’s second-largest lender once Moynihan steps down.
